940330.name: BBlocks
940330.description:
Join a few blocks here, a little there and watch the blocks unite like magic.

BBlocks is a fun game for you to train your agility and reasoning skills.

Your goal is to position as many blocks as possible in the right position, if the blocks reach the sky, you lose.

If you join the blocks in the right position they will come together and disappear, if they get in the wrong position they will continue there.

Pass levels, increase punctuation, do everything you need, just do not let the blocks reach the sky.

Are you ready for the adventure?
940330.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
